      • getInstance

        public static Mysql getInstance()
        Singleton getter for an instance of this class.
        Returns:
        the single instance registered
        Note:
        the instance must be set using the init(String, String, String, String, String) method.

      • init

        public static Mysql init(String host,
         String port,
         String database,
         String user,
         String password)
                  throws SQLException
        Singleton setter for an instance of this class. If an instance if this class is already registered, calling this method will not replace the current singleton instance ; the new call will be ignored and the original instance will be returned instead.
        Parameters:
        host - the database host. See Database.host.
        port - the database port. See Database.port.
        database - the database name. See Database.database.
        user - the database user. See Database.user.
        password - the database password. See Database.password.
        Returns:
        the newly created instance
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • connect

        protected void connect()
                throws SQLException
        Description copied from class: Database
        This method should be implemented in order to (re)establish the connection. This method will be called when a dropped connection is discovered in order to reconnect to the database. (SQLState 08*)
        Specified by:
        connect in class Database
        Throws:
        SQLException
